control.content:
General
Features
Content
Single Episode Lists
Accounts
Results
Playback '

item.property: Enable this and Fen Light will autostart after running its services upon Kodi start
Choose any custom background you would like to use within Fen Light

Enable this and Fen Light will limit the threads enacted simultaneously. Best to leave this disabled unless you are having issues with your device not supporting high numbers of concurrent threads in python
Choose the maximum active concurrent threads Fen Light will be limited to
Choose the manner in which Fen Light handles updates
Choose the delay time before Fen Light checks for updates after Kodi start
Leave this setting as default unless you wsh to update Fen Light through a different user repository. If you do, enter the Github Username of the new github location
Leave this setting as default unless you wsh to update Fen Light through a different user repository. If you do, enter the Github Repo Address of the new github location
Choose the provider that keeps track of the Movies and Episodes you have watched within Fen Light. Options are the built in method of Fen Light or your Trakt account
Choose how often Fen Light polls your Trakt service for any changes
Enable this and Fen Light will refresh widgets after performing a Trakt Sync if there were any changes
Choose the correct UTC offset based on your location
Choose your download location for Movies
Choose your download location for TV Shows
Choose your download location for Premium files. Includes downloads from debrid service caches or Easynews
Choose your download location for Images
Choose what content is included within the Extras window
Choose the function and order of the buttons in the Extras window. You can set separate button functions for Movies and TV Shows
Enable this and the Extras menu will show ratings from more services than just TMDb. Must have a valid OMDb API assigned in the Accounts settings for this to show
Choose this and the individual lists within the Extras window will each utilize a scrollbar when needed
Choose the Open Action when a Movie is selected in Fen Light. Choices Are None, Open Extras, Open Movie Set, Both. "Both" will open the Movie Set if available or open Extras
Choose the Open Action when a TV Show is selected in Fen Light. Choices Are None or Open Extras
Choose the sort order for your In Progress media
Choose the sort order for your Watched media
Choose the sort order for your Trakt Collection media
Choose the sort order for your Trakt Watchlist media
Choose whether Fen Light refreshes widgets based on a set timer. You should set a value here if you are using random widgets from Fen Light, and wish for their contents to update between Kodi starts
Enable this and Fen Light will show a notification whenever widgets are refreshed by the timer
Enable this and watched items will be hidden in Fen Light widgets
Hide Next Page Item in Widgets
Enable this and the "Next Page" item will be hidden in Fen Light widgets
Enable this and Fen Light will attempt to paginate lists when possible. This is mainly applicable to personal lists
Choose the limit of pagination when within Fen Light
Choose the limit of pagination for Fen Light widgets
Service used for Because You Watched
Choose which service provides recommendations for the Because You Watched menus. Options are Recommended (TMDb) or More Like This (IMDb)
Seeds used for Because You Watched Random
Choose how much previously watched media is used for recommendations for the Because You Watched Random menu.
Choose the region from which the MPAA advisories will be displayed
Choose where fully watched, but still airing TV Shows are shown. Options are Watched, In Progress or Both
Enable this and Fen Light will show TV Show Special Episodes
Choose the times when Fen Light will load all episodes of a TV Show when browsed into
Include Unaired Media in Trakt Watchlists
Enable this and Fen Light will display any unaired media in your Trakt Movie/TV Show Watchlists. Disable this and any unaired Media will be hidden
Include Adult Results from Media Searches

Enable this and Fen Light will attempt to filter out adult content from Movie, TV Show and People searches. Success is based purely on the accuracy of TMDbs database. Expect that some adult results may come through and plan accordingly

Enable this and Fen Light will control view types used within the addon. This can be disabled if the skin you are using has a helper that provides a "lock view" type function. If enabled, views can be set in Tools->Set Views within the addon
Enable this to manually enter values for the viewtypes used. Only do this if you know the viewtype values for the skin you are using. Otherwise, use the "Set Views" menu in Tools
Enter the Viewtype ID for Menu Content
Enter the Viewtype ID for Movies Content
Enter the Viewtype ID for TV Shows Content
Enter the Viewtype ID for Seasons Content
Enter the Viewtype ID for Episodes Content
Enter the Viewtype ID for Episode Lists Content
Enter the Viewtype ID for Premium Files Content
Single Episode Display Format - Within Addon
Choose the display format Fen Light uses when naming single episodes within the addon. Applicable for lists like Next Episodes, In Progress Episodes etc
Choose the display format Fen Light uses when naming single episodes for widgets. Applicable for lists like Next Episodes, In Progress Episodes etc
Enable this to share with Kodi the number of unwatched episodes for the TV Show of each episode in single episode lists
Choose the method used to determine the content of your Next Episodes list. Last Aired or Last Watched
Choose the sort type of Next Episodes list. Recently Watched, Airdate or Title
Choose the sort direction of Next Episodes list. Ascending or Descending
Enable this to limit the amount of watched history used to determine Next Episodes

A setting of "20" will limit the history used based on the previous 20 watched episodes. This means a 20 limit will not usually result in 20 items in your Next Episodes list, rather the previous 20 watched episodes will be used as history
Choose which lists are included within Fen Lights Next Episodes. You can include your Trakt Watchlist, your Fen Light Favorites, or both. They will show with a DARKGOLDENROD highlight
Enable this to include the airdate at the beginning of the list item label
Enable this to sort episodes airing today to the top of the Next Episodes list
Include Unaired Episodes When Within 7 Days
Enable this to include unaired episodes within Next Episodes. They will show with a RED highlight and become visible within 7 days of their airdate
Flatten TV Shows Airing on Same Day
Enable this to limit to the first instance of a TV Show episode when that TV Show has multiple episodes airing on the same day
Choose the sort direction of the Trakt Calendar list. Ascending or Descending
Choose how many previous days will be shown within the Trakt Calendar
Choose how many future days will be shown within the Trakt Calendar
Authorize your Trakt account and use it within Fen Light
Revoke authorization of your Trakt account
Enter here your Trakt Client ID key
Restore default Trakt Client ID Key
Enter here your Trakt Client Secret key
Restore default Trakt Client Secret Key
Enter here your TMDb API key
Test if your TMDb API is activated and working
Enter here your OMDb API key. This will allow you to utilize extra ratings information in Fen Lights Extras window
Enable this to use external scrapers. No support is provided when you choose to use external scrapers within Fen Light
Choose the external scraper module to use within Fen Light. No support is provided when you choose to use external scrapers within Fen Light
Open the External Scraper settings. The settings of the module chosen above will be opened
Authorize your Real Debrid account and use it within Fen Light
Enable the use of your Real Debrid account
Revoke authorization of your Real Debrid account
Add Resolved Debrid Cache to Cloud
Choose which resolved media is automatically added to your Real Debrid Cloud. All media or only show packs
Enable this and Fen Light will search your Real Debrid Cloud for media
Enable this and Fen Light will perform extra name matching functions on your Real Debrid Cloud results. Will help to limit incorrect results, but may also filter some relevant results
Enable this and Fen Light will search for results in your Real Debrid Cloud before checking other enabled scrapers
Enable this and Fen Light will sort the results from your Real Debrid Cloud to the top of all results
Choose the order in which Real Debrid results appear in relation to any other active accounts. The lower the number, the higher the sort order
Authorize your Premiumize account and use it within Fen Light
Enable the use of your Premiumize account
Revoke authorization of your Premiumize account
Add Resolved Debrid Cache to Cloud
Choose which resolved media is automatically added to your Premiumize Cloud. All media or only show packs
Enable this and Fen Light will search your Premiumize Cloud for media
Enable this and Fen Light will perform extra name matching functions on your Premiumize Cloud results. Will help to limit incorrect results, but may also filter some relevant results
Enable this and Fen Light will search for results in your Premiumize Cloud before checking other enabled scrapers
Enable this and Fen Light will sort the results from your Premiumize Cloud to the top of all results
Choose the order in which Real Debrid results appear in relation to any other active accounts. The lower the number, the higher the sort order
Authorize your All Debrid account and use it within Fen Light
Enable the use of your All Debrid account
Revoke authorization of your All Debrid account
Add Resolved Debrid Cache to Cloud
Choose which resolved media is automatically added to your All Debrid Cloud. All media or only show packs
Enable this and Fen Light will search your All Debrid Cloud for media
Enable this and Fen Light will perform extra name matching functions on your All Debrid Cloud results. Will help to limit incorrect results, but may also filter some relevant results
Enable this and Fen Light will search for results in your All Debrid Cloud before checking other enabled scrapers
Enable this and Fen Light will sort the results from your All Debrid Cloud to the top of all results
Choose the order in which All Debrid results appear in relation to any other active accounts. The lower the number, the higher the sort order
Authorize your Off Cloud account and use it within Fen Light
Enable the use of your Off Cloud account
Revoke authorization of your Off Cloud account
Add Resolved Debrid Cache to Cloud
Choose which resolved media is automatically added to your Off Cloud Cloud. All media or only show packs
Enable this and Fen Light will search your Off Cloud Cloud for media
Enable this and Fen Light will perform extra name matching functions on your Off Cloud Cloud results. Will help to limit incorrect results, but may also filter some relevant results
Enable this and Fen Light will search for results in your Off Cloud Cloud before checking other enabled scrapers
Enable this and Fen Light will sort the results from your Off Cloud Cloud to the top of all results
Choose the order in which Off Cloud results appear in relation to any other active accounts. The lower the number, the higher the sort order
Authorize your Easy Debrid account and use it within Fen Light
Enable the use of your Easy Debrid account
Revoke authorization of your Easy Debrid account
Choose the order in which Easy Debrid results appear in relation to any other active accounts. The lower the number, the higher the sort order
Authorize your TorBox account and use it within Fen Light
Enable the use of your TorBox account
Revoke authorization of your TorBox account
Add Resolved Debrid Cache to Cloud
Choose which resolved media is automatically added to your TorBox Cloud. All media or only show packs
Enable this and Fen Light will search your TorBox Cloud for media
Enable this and Fen Light will perform extra name matching functions on your TorBox Cloud results. Will help to limit incorrect results, but may also filter some relevant results
Enable this and Fen Light will search for results in your TorBox Cloud before checking other enabled scrapers
Enable this and Fen Light will sort the results from your TorBox Cloud to the top of all results
Choose the order in which TorBox results appear in relation to any other active accounts. The lower the number, the higher the sort order
Enable the use of your Easynews account
Enter the Login of your Easynews account
Enter the Password of your Easynews account
Enable this and Fen Light will perform extra name matching functions on your Easynews results. Will help to limit incorrect results, but may also filter some relevant results
Enable this and Fen Light will perform extra language filtering on your Easynews results. Will help to limit incorrect results, but may also filter some relevant results
Choose which languages you wish to include in Easynews results
Enable this and Fen Light will search for results from your Easynews service before checking other enabled scrapers
Choose the order in which Real Debrid results appear in relation to any other active accounts. The lower the number, the higher the sort order
Enable the use of any local media folder locations i.e. NAS drives, HDDs etc
Choose this to activate a settings window allowing you to set the location of up to 5 devices containing local media
Enable this and Fen Light will perform extra name matching functions on your local media folders results. Will help to limit incorrect results, but may also filter some relevant results
Enable this and Fen Light will search for results from your local media folders before checking other enabled scrapers
Enable this and Fen Light will sort the results from your local media folders to the top of all results
Enable this and Fen Light will ignore any Quality or Size filters when processing local media folders results
Choose the amount of time Fen Light will allow all scrapers to search for results
Choose the format in which Fen Light will display the results of a source search. Lists, Rows and WideList are provided
Retry With All Scrapers When No Results
Choose whether to rescrape with all external scrapers when there are no results. Choices are Off, Auto or Prompt
Retry With Custom Episode Group When No Results

Choose whether to rescrape with a custom episode grouping (if available) when there are no results. This setting only relates to episode scrapes. If a Custom Episode Group is already assigned to the TV Show, then the regular season/episode will be used. Choices are Off, Auto or Prompt
Ignore All Filters When No Results
Choose whether to rescrape ignoring filters when there are no results. Choices are Off, Auto or Prompt
Choose the priority ordering performed by Fen Light before displaying source results
Choose the sort direction with regards to results size
Choose the method used to filter results by their size. Either by internet speed, or actual size of the result

Enter here your internet line speed. It is a good idea to choose a value slightly below your true internet speed, although Fen Light will still reduce this value by 10% before filtering results by size
Enter here the Maximum size allowed for Movies playback
Enter here the Maximum size allowed for Episodes playback
Enter here the Minimum size allowed for Movies
Enter here the Minimum size allowed for Episodes
Enable this and Fen Light will include results where the size of the file is unknown
Choose how to handle Pre-Release source results. They can be INCLUDED or EXCLUDED
Choose how to handle 3D source results. They can be INCLUDED or EXCLUDED
Choose how to handle HDR source results. They can be INCLUDED or EXCLUDED
Choose how to handle DOLBY VISION source results. They can be INCLUDED or EXCLUDED
Choose how to handle AV1 source results. They can be INCLUDED or EXCLUDED
Choose how to handle AI Enhanced/Upscaled source results. They can be INCLUDED or EXCLUDED
Choose how to handle HEVC source results. They can be INCLUDED or EXCLUDED
Choose the maximum quality allowed for HEVC files when allowing source select
Choose the maximum quality allowed for HEVC files being autoplayed

Choose video and audio properties that will be sorted to the top of the sources list when using Autoplay. Choose up to 5 different parameters to be used, in order of importance. "Sort to Top" settings involving Debrid Cache and Folder Scraper results will take priority over these 5 params
Choose audio properties that will be filtered out of source results
Choose the method used to provide highlight colors to source results. The options are PROVIDER, QUALITY, or the use of a SINGLE COLOR
Choose Single color for all results
Enable this for Movies to play automatically when selected
Choose the Quality properties allowed for source select results
Choose the Quality properties allowed for autoplay results
Choose when Fen Light will automatically resume playback of an in-progress Movie
Enable this for Episodes to play automatically when selected
Choose the Quality properties allowed for source select results
Choose the Quality properties allowed for autoplay results
Enable this and Fen Light will automatically search for sources for the next episode of a TV Show towards the end of the episode currently being watched
Choose the action performed when you fail to interact with the Next Episode alert
Choose the alert method when Next Episode is ready to be played. Choose Window or Notification
Choose when Fen Light will show the Next Episode Alert
- Use Chapter Info For Alert When Available

Enable this and Fen Light will attempt to use video file Chapter information to ascertain when to show the Next Episode alert. If unsuccessful, then the percentage of playback value will be used instead
Enable this and Fen Light will automatically search for sources for the next episode of a TV Show towards the end of the episode currently being watched
Choose when Fen Light will show the Next Episode Alert
- Use Chapter Info For Alert When Available

Enable this and Fen Light will attempt to use video file Chapter information to ascertain when to show the Next Episode alert. If unsuccessful, then the percentage of playback value will be used instead
Choose when Fen Light will automatically resume playback of an in-progress Episode
Limit Resolve Attempts to Selected Result

Enable this and Fen Light will limit the playback attempts to only the source result chosen. If disabled, Fen Light will potentially try 15 results of similar properties to your chosen source result until it is able to successfully resolve and playback
Check Volume Before Start of Playback
Enable this and Fen Light will attempt to check the current level of volume within Kodi, and adjust it downwards if it is exceeding a set level
Choose the maximum allowed volume level
